attributes.action: Repeal the Genetic Technology (Precision Breeding) Act 2023
attributes.additional_details:
We believe it's democratic and right thing to do.
 
The Government should involve the public in matters that directly affect their health & wellbeing.
 
The Government should provide detailed information about any health implications/benefits that may result from the use of genetic technology, ahead of any future consultation or public vote.
attributes.background: Having repealed this act, if the Government wants to reintroduce it they should hold a public consultation & invite the public to have its say, since it directly relates to the way food is being produced.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
